body_html:
Hello, I am having the same problem. Has anyone found a solution?
I am using another network on raspberry and it works fine, but not this one.
In my case the error looks like this:

2018-08-14 09:56:59.250458: W tensorflow/core/framework/allocator.cc:108] Allocation of 5677056 exceeds 10% of system memory.
2018-08-14 09:56:59.288605: W tensorflow/core/framework/allocator.cc:108] Allocation of 5677056 exceeds 10% of system memory.
Bus error

body:
Hello, I am having the same problem. Has anyone found a solution?
I am using another network on raspberry and it works fine, but not this one.
In my case the error looks like this:


2018-08-14 09:56:59.250458: W tensorflow/core/framework/allocator.cc:108] Allocation of 5677056 exceeds 10% of system memory.
2018-08-14 09:56:59.288605: W tensorflow/core/framework/allocator.cc:108] Allocation of 5677056 exceeds 10% of system memory.
Bus error
